  • esis

esis¶

Package which provides a model of the ESIS instrument and classes for representing and analyzing ESIS observations.

Modules

esis.data

This package provides a set of classes for converting raw ESIS data into useful scientific information.

esis.flight

Package is for code and information relating to the 2019 flight

esis.optics

Model of the ESIS optical system

esis.science
